paragraphs: In Prague, Roman Martynov, an outstanding pianist and educator who continues the best musical traditions of Europe and the world, will perform. The concert will take place on September 29th at the Atrium Žižkov hall.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.

Martynov is a semifinalist of the International Piano Competition in Hamamatsu (Japan, 2012), laureate of the XI Festival of Young Soloists (2005), winner of the third prize at the 16th Hamamatsu Academy Competition (2012), as well as other international awards.

Performed at AssamblyHall (Salt Lake City, USA), the concert hall "Sinfonia Varsovia" in Warsaw, the A. Cortot Hall in Paris, the Rachmaninoff, Small and Large Halls of the Tchaikovsky Moscow State Conservatory, at the Concert Hall of the Mariinsky Theatre in St. Petersburg, and other famous venues.
📍 Where: Atrium Žižkov, Čajkovského 12, Žižkov, Prague 3;
Duration of the concert: 60 minutes with an intermission.
👉 Tickets are being sold at this link.
